word_mean: 作用，效应，效果，功效：产生特定结果或发挥特定可测影响的能力
一种基于业务性能的可用性。

sentence.Network_en: Our research attempts to evaluate the effectiveness of the different drugs.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的研究试图对不同药物的疗效进行评估。

sentence.Network_en: The drugs work well at first but gradually lose their effectiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些药的效果起初非常好,但后来逐渐失效.

sentence.Network_en: To assert this is to denigrate the effectiveness of the police.
sentence.Network_cn: 坚持这一点就是贬低警方的办事能力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 效能(EFFECTIVENESS)与效率(EFFICIENCY)引入DiE时, 我们会注重两个范畴。
（1）有效性（effectiveness）（Effectiveness）——是指信息与商业过程相关，并以及时、准确、一致和可行的方式传送。（2）高效性（Efficiency）…

3d max 中英文对照 - 小M的日志 - 网易博客 ... Editable Poly 可编辑多边形 Effect 影响；效果；特效 Effects 效果；影响；特效.
有效率(efficiency)的分配时间与有效(effective)的达成目标才能一一实现各种琳琅满目的愿望，时间管理诚可谓迈向成功的第一步。
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... effect v 实施；生效；效果 effective v 有效的 effectuate v 使…有效.

entry.tran: 有效的;能产生预期效果的
entry.def: Something that is effective works well and produces the results that were intended.

example.ex: The project looks at how we could be more effective in encouraging students to enter teacher training...
example.tran: 该项目着眼于我们如何能够更加有效地鼓励学生参与教师培训。

example.ex: Simple antibiotics are effective against this organism...
example.tran: 一般的抗生素能够有效对抗这种微生物。

entry.def: Effective means having a particular role or result in practice, though not officially or in theory.

example.ex: They have had effective control of the area since the security forces left.
example.tran: 自从安全部队撤离后，他们实际上控制了该地区。

example.ex: ...a restructuring that would have resulted in an effective increase on one of their most popular excursion fares.
example.tran: 原本会使他们最热门的一条短途旅游线路的费用出现实质性上涨的调整

entry.tran: （法律、协议等）生效的，起作用的
entry.def: When something such as a law or an agreement becomes effective, it begins officially to apply or be valid.

example.ex: The new rules will become effective in the next few days.
example.tran: 新规定将在几天后生效。

means.word_mean: 1. power to be effective; the quality of being able to bring about an effect
2. capacity to produce strong physiological or chemical effects;

auth_sentence.content: The evidence for the effectiveness of incentives is mixed.

Sentence.sentence: In a division of electronic engineers, who were designing equipments so advanced that they work in teams of up to 150, co-workers and managers were asked to nominate the standouts- the stars in productivity and effectiveness

sentences.en: Bad diction marred the effectiveness of his speech.
sentences.cn: 措词不当影响了他演说的效果。

sentences.en: The drugs work well at first but gradually lose their effectiveness.
sentences.cn: 这些药的效果起初非常好，但后来逐渐失效。
